website_summaries.verdict: This heavy, capable bandsaw is solidly-built, steady, and powerful. If you're looking for a high-quality tool, you won't regret investing in this Jet.
pros: Features cast iron wheels, frame, and table
Adjustments and blade changes are easy and straightforward, and you won't be disappointed with its performance
cons: Doesn't come with the fence pictured in the product photo
Center of gravity is a little high
You have to take care to tension the blade correctly to avoid safety issues

customer_reviews.title: Excellent machine for wood and light plastics
customer_reviews.text: Great bandsaw for hobbyists. I’ve been using mine since 2016 with very little issues. One thing I didn’t research at the time was the speed specifications. There are two (belt driven) speeds: 1500 and 3000 SFPM. This basically limits the bandsaw to cutting wood and some plastics. The speeds are simply too fast for cutting metal. That said - I have cut Aluminum using the machine, but the blade essentially gets dull fast. All in all though, I’m satisfied with the machine and it’s build quality.
customer_reviews.author: redtreetoad

customer_reviews.title: Great saw but the instruction manual sucks
customer_reviews.text: Just received my new bandsaw, and I love it. The only issue I had setting it up was the instruction manual. It's a real stinker. But you can find better instructions online.
customer_reviews.author: tanfab

customer_reviews.title: great saw.
customer_reviews.text: just put this thing together last night. Right out of the box this thing needed very little to make it operational. I closely read the instructions and this thing tracked perfectly right out of the gate. I opted for the fence upgrade from kreg tools. Next upgrade will be to get a real dust collection system. My shop vac just isn't cutting it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: BobTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Versatility
customer_reviews.text: An amazing and versatile tool. Quality and attention to detail in manufacturing are apparent everywhere. I did not purchase the Jet fence after reading the reviews, but bought a Kreg fence instead and this has worked out to be a great combo. Making the guide adjustments is a little awkward on the guides located on the under-side of the table, but otherwise most adjustments are relatively easy to make. Blades changes are quick and tension and tracking adjustments are simple. Overall this is an excellent saw.
customer_reviews.author: Dave in the Desert

customer_reviews.title: Crack in frame, useless.
customer_reviews.text: If the problem is fixed, I'll change the review. Just received the saw today, I walked it out of the box carefully and unwrapped it and immediately saw the crack in the iron. Its totally unusable. The frame is bent and there is no way it can cut square. I dont see any cracks in the paint where it could have been dropped which leads me to believe that it left the factory in this condition. I hope the seller will get back to me and help me fix this problem, until then back into the box it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Willliam

customer_reviews.title: Don't Trust all the Product Description
customer_reviews.text: I am totally pleased with this band saw. So far it has out performed my expectations. The only draw back is part of the product description i.e. 'Blade Size L x W x Thickness in. 93-105 x 1/8-3/4, ' based on this I ordered three blades in length of 97 3/4" which falls within the 93-105 length as stated, however, it is not long enough. For those who are looking at purchasing this saw, I highly recommend it but I suggest you wait until you have the saw and measure the factory installed blade length before purchasing any blades.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: As advertised...and more.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy I chose the Jet brand for my first shop quality band saw. I have, for years, owned some inferior brands and finally decided to upgrade to this machine. I own other JET products and as I expected the fit and finish of this saw is fantastic. Set up is very easy, and it has more than enough power to get through the toughest materials. I highly recommend investing in the JET fence system for this table saw - you will be kicking yourself if you don't =)
customer_reviews.author: Cristian

customer_reviews.title: Discription of item
customer_reviews.text: Saw is fine only one problem Amazon site shows it with a fince and so dose manual BUT NO FINCE CAME WITH IT !!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: J L

customer_reviews.title: This is one bad a-- bandsaw
customer_reviews.text: This is one bad a-- bandsaw. Coming from a 10" Delta (that served me well for over 10 years) --- this one will outlive me! Sturdy and accurate. Lots of small details make this awesome. But buy good blades like the Resaw King if you want to resaw something like 12" hardwood. I.e. don't blame the saw for crappy cuts if you use cheap blades and/or don't tension it correctly.
customer_reviews.author: DebbieS26

customer_reviews.title: Great saw, also got the fence and base for ...
customer_reviews.text: Great saw, also got the fence and base for it, great quality, works great, the key to making it great is in your set up, take the time to set it up right, Youtube it if your not sure.
customer_reviews.author: Ray A

customer_reviews.title: Great value in a 14 inch bandsaw
customer_reviews.text: One thing I love about this model is the resaw capacity, twelve inch as delivered. Although longer than 'normal' blades are required, I prefer the saw being designed for that much capacity over adding a riser block. I think the fewer connection points there are, the less that any flexing can occur. The capacity, combined with the larger motor than 'usual' for a fourteen inch saw will allow me to resaw larger width pieces easier than a 'lesser' saw.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: it really is the best band-saw i ever bought
customer_reviews.text: it really is the best band-saw i ever bought ,very smooth,have a plan to get the top on ,not a one man job
customer_reviews.author: ED CARR

customer_reviews.title: great saw
customer_reviews.text: had it up and running in no time flat for the price, its hard to beat ive got other jet products and love em
customer_reviews.author: John C. Parks

customer_reviews.title: Great Band Saw - Worth EVERY dollar!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice design and thought went into this bandsaw. I bought the fence also and love it. I only wish that it came with a light to illuminate your work on the table. I would recommend this one to all who want a nice bandsaw for general work and also re-sawing larger chunks of wood. I got the free delivery on this one and saved alot of $$ because of it. Thank you Amazon for that! Buy one and you'll be very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: mikekramer4

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Delivered in good condition into my garage. I set it up in one and a half hours with the help of two strong men! You will need these! Another half hour to set up the guides and the blade, and we were on the way. An excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Pete

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic piece of equipment added to my shop
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic piece of equipment added to my shop. Don't know how I got along without it till now. And the price was great from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo D.

customer_reviews.title: Great saw for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about the saw. It is great for re-sawing. So far there is nothing I don't like about the saw.
customer_reviews.author: n2wood

customer_reviews.title: Great 14” bandsaw for woodshop
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as an addition to my wood shop. It was easy to setup and does a wonderful job. So glad to add it to my tools.
customer_reviews.author: JCook2274

customer_reviews.title: great machine
customer_reviews.text: does everything I want it to do and then some
customer_reviews.author: Doug B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Blade is so so on re-sawing but the unit itself is awesome
customer_reviews.author: PBuck

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wow so easy to assemble and runs smooth and love the quick blade release and change
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome piece, very happy
customer_reviews.text: Best jig saw replacement I ever had LOL. Can't believe I didn't have this sooner. You can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Uncle John

customer_reviews.title: Excellent band saw
customer_reviews.text: If your gonna get your own, this is the one to have. Excellent quality, rock solid, vibration free. Urethane tires, ball bearing blade guides, wheel brush cleaner. But be forewarned, it comes in two pieces. The band frame (well protected packing) and the box it mounts on will require at LEAST 2 linebackers to lift and place into position! What I'm trying to say is this thing will last you forever because of the weight of the frame. If space is issue, get the rolling frame, works great. And just spend the little extra on blades and go with Timberwolf blades.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M. Benson

customer_reviews.title: Bandsaw
customer_reviews.text: Best bandsaw for the price. Easy setup, blade changeout and use. Bought for cutting bowl blanks and has the capacity of 12" without modifications. Works very well with the cutting sled. Just wish it had a dust port below the blade when cutting. The one on side is fine for collecting from bottom cabinet but sawdust falling before that ends up on floor. I can live with it.
customer_reviews.author: Undy

customer_reviews.title: Jet 14 inch Band Saw
customer_reviews.text: Purchased so that i would be able to do some re-sawing. This replace an older 10 inch unit that had very limited re-saw ability. This works great for saw smaller log into boards for smaller projects.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Addition to the workshop
customer_reviews.text: This is my first experience with Jet products and I am well pleased. Setup was simple. I spent more time getting the oily film off of the table. WD-40 did the trick. Highly recommend watching the 35 minute video on YouTube on setting up your bandsaw. Purchased the Carter magfence. I will get my money's worth out of this saw. It is now $150 cheaper than when I got it too weeks ago!
customer_reviews.author: Dean Miller

customer_reviews.title: Wait for a sale.
customer_reviews.text: If I had it to do over, I probably would have gotten the Rikon - which had a larger motor and included the fence and miter gage. Otherwise, I'm very happy with this since it's what I wanted for re-saw operations. It arrives via motor freight unassembled so have a friend (or a hoist) to help assemble it. I would not have paid full price for it. I waited for a sale since they run these occasionally on a sale drop shipped from Jet. With the current no sales tax rates with Amazon, this saved me a little over buying local.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Safer, quiet and ease of changing blades
customer_reviews.text: I have taught "woodshop" in public schools since 1970 and have experience with many brands of band saws. The new JET JWBS-14DXPR 14 - Inch Deluxe Pro Band Saw Kit was well received by my students. They like the quietness, ease of adjusting the guide/safety guard, location of the on/off switch and the effective location of the dust collector outlet. I like all of the above plus the ease with which the blade can be changed.
customer_reviews.author: jhorton

customer_reviews.title: Workshop Band Saw
customer_reviews.text: This saw replaced a thiry year old Jet Bandsaw and the improvements in its design. adjustment and usability are outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Alice H. Winfield

customer_reviews.title: This is the one you want
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous machine, best there is. Does everything you ever wanted from a band saw, without having to "add on" anything....
customer_reviews.author: Coffinguy!

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: Has good power to move the blade through the work. ease to change blades and adjust. First time owner of a big band saw and have a lot of learning to use it right. What I wanted it for is resawing snd will be doing that next.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Allen

customer_reviews.title: It cones with bad blade
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this a 5 star if they had not shipped a bad quality blade (their tech support suggested i buy a good blade!!) . I spent hours tryibg to adjust it to make it resaw straight withno luck until i purchased and installed a good quality blade.
customer_reviews.author: John K

customer_reviews.title: The saw works great! would recommend the bandsaw
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my son. He had no problem assembling by himself, but he assembled the cast iron table after he placed it on his mobile cart. He said the blade that came with it was flimsy, but I purchased additional blades when I purchased the saw due to the previous reviews. The saw works great! would recommend the bandsaw.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to work with
customer_reviews.text: Had this for about two weeks now and it is performing like a champ. You'll need to get a new blade as the one that comes with it seems to be made of pop can material. But it works great and was fairly easy to set up
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Everything you could want for the woodworkers shop. A pleasure to use and should outlast me and the next person who owns it.
customer_reviews.author: Bratigan

customer_reviews.title: Was easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Has met all my expectation. Was easy to set up, runs smooth and quite, and found no power issues thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel D. Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Very nice machine for the money
customer_reviews.text: Every bit as good as a Delta or Rigid machine for less money. Very good adjustment capability. A small piece was missing from the fence ordered to go with this tool.... I called, and they were very quick to solve the problem. A minor disappointment was that I was hoping this could be a metal or wood machine, but I think it is best used only for wood. Still hard to argue with the price.....well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Jet Band Saw
customer_reviews.text: the jet brand is top of the line in wood shop equipment. the band saw is just what i was looking for, i will tell everyone about it. thanks to amazon and the jet co. Bruce Long
customer_reviews.author: bruce long

customer_reviews.title: Get a top line saw first
customer_reviews.text: This band saw is top notch. I did a lot of research on band saws before I bought this model. I had a smaller underpowered saw before this and it was basically a waste of money. There a couple other brands that are very good too but when you buy a Jet product you are getting as good as it gets.
customer_reviews.author: Blair Goltra

customer_reviews.title: Well built!
customer_reviews.text: Well built. I haven't used the saw yet, but I am pleased with the sturdiness off the unit. The only negative I have at this point is the motor fan was rubbing on the inside of the fan grill. I used a screw-driver to pry the grill away very slightly and that took care of it. I will update once I've given it some use.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. It was easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I only gave it a 4 star because i haven't used it that much yet to give it a rating. Will edit this review sometime in the near future . So far so good. It was easy to set up. Added a Kreg fence to it and was easy to install. Blade that comes with it sucks but was to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: red dog

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This saw is great. The blade has great tension resulting in no drift while cutting.
customer_reviews.author: Marjory Clark

customer_reviews.title: The design is great, all adjustments while working are fast and the ...
customer_reviews.text: This bandsaw exided my expectations. The design is great , all adjustments while working are fast and the accuracy of cut leads to minimum waste of materials
customer_reviews.author: Lubos Naprstek

customer_reviews.title: Everything we expected and more
customer_reviews.text: Excellent transport and arrival by truck ; easy assembly and works beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: palace49owner

customer_reviews.title: Very nice heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Very nice heavy duty. Easy to set up and operate. Can't wait to retire so I can use it more
customer_reviews.author: Tony Broussard

customer_reviews.title: good saw
customer_reviews.text: For the price its a quility ban saw.I do hobby wood work.I had to have a fork lift at home to unload.Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Max  F. High

customer_reviews.title: Jet band saw review
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a chance to use saw yet but from first sight I am very pleased with what I got, I'll give a more in depth review after I have used the saw for a while.
customer_reviews.author: MARK COPELAND

customer_reviews.title: one thing is broken
customer_reviews.text: when i went to set it up i discovered that the release lever was broken what do i do to get this corrected
customer_reviews.author: james rice

customer_reviews.title: Item NOT as described!
customer_reviews.text: The deluxe model show the rip fence but was not included! Also there is a pin missing on the steel table top. I have tried to contact seller but have been unsuccessful. i would not recommend purchaseing.
customer_reviews.author: sim

product_meta.title: JET JWBS-14DXPRO 14-Inch Deluxe Pro Band Saw Kit
product_meta.description:
Style:Deluxe Pro Band Saw KitWe see a future built on great brands, great products and great people. In every facet of our business we leverage the strengths of our global infrastructure to maximize the benefits of all three.

AMAZON.COM
Boasting updated, innovative features that provide reliable precision while rendering the riser block obsolete, the JWBS-14DXPRO 14-Inch Deluxe Pro Band Saw Kit from Jet tackles even the toughest resawing jobs measuring up to 12 inches. A host of helpful details, including a high tension spring design, gives you more power and control for clean, accurate cuts, and sturdy construction ensures optimum durability for long-term use.



High Cutting Capacity and Built-in Retractable Blade Guard for Versatility
To power through material of various sizes, this band saw offers a cutting capacity width of 13.5 inches and cutting capacity height of 12 inches. It also offers a built-in retractable blade guard that moves up and down from zero to 12 inches, so you have the versatility to work with both smaller and larger work pieces.Cast Iron Frame for Powerful Performance
With its massive, super-tough cast iron frame, and a blade speed of 1500/3000 SFPM, the JWBS-14DXPRO packs a powerful punch to cut through material quickly and easily. The rigidity of this newly redesigned frame also allows for even the toughest resawing jobs and saves you the hassle of using a riser block.

Sturdy Table for a Wide Range of Projects
Thanks to its sturdy, 15 x 15-inch work table that's designed to tilt 10 degrees left and 45 degrees right, the JWBS-14DXPRO gives you the flexibility to meet the unique demands of each project. And with a height of 43.5 inches, the table ensures you can meet a range of woodworking jobs head-on.

Upper and Lower Ball Bearing Guides for Reduced Friction
The JWBS-14DXPRO's redesigned features lend incredible durability. Most significantly, upper and lower ball bearing guides help to reduce friction, which enhances blade performance and translates into longer blade life.

A Range of Features for Precision and Safety
An efficient poly-v belt drive system provides more precise results while giving you the choice of two speeds for better control. Additionally, a convenient quick release blade tension ensures flexibility and fast, effortless adjustments. There's also a blade guide post with rack and pinion adjustment for better accuracy, and an efficient high tension spring design for consistently powerful performance even after repetitive and long-term use.

Easy-View Window and Blade Guide Post for Safety
Safety is of utmost importance when working with spinning blades. That's why the JWBS-14DXPRO includes an easy-to-view blade tracking window. With this handy feature, you're always aware of the blade's position as you work.

Enclosed Stand for Better Organization
This band saw helps you keep track of materials and reduce clutter in your shop by featuring an enclosed stand with a handy storage shelf. There's also an easy-access door so you can quickly grab what you need and get back to work.

The JWBS-14DXPRO is backed by a five-year warranty.

About JET: A History of Sharing New, Feature-Rich Products
Opened in 1958 after the founder of the company, Leslie P. Sussman, took the first Boeing Jet Airplane trip from Seattle, Washington to Japan, JET began as a small dealer that sold air hoists and trolleys out of a single hardware store in Seattle. Over the years, JET has carried everything from snowmobiles, transmitter radios, and forklifts to nylon stockings, but by the early 1970s, metalworking had become the base of their business line. And by the 1980s, JET had expanded into the realm of woodworking. Today, you'll find that JET offers a wide range of popular woodworking tools that are backed with best-in-class features and excellent service.

What's in the Box
JWBS-14DXPRO 14-Inch Deluxe Pro Band Saw, base, trunnion, table, and instructions




FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The all-new JWBS-14D by PRO 14-Inch Deluxe Bandsaw from JET has been fully redesigned to meet the needs of today's most demanding woodworkers. Gone are the days of adding a riser block; this 14-Inch Bandsaw comes with a massive cast iron frame for increased power that makes it ready to meet all resaw expectations head-on. Couple this incredible feature with a new high tension spring design and many more amazing features and you have a Bandsaw that will last for years to come. Put a new JET 14-Inch Bandsaw in your shop and you'll know that JET tools are Built Better to Build Better.

See more
feature_bullets: Built in 12 Inch resaw capacity for cutting larger pieces of wood
2 speed poly v belt drive system
Newly designed upper and lower cast iron frame for increased strength and rigidity
Easy to view blade tracking window
Blade guide post with rack and pinion adjustment
